verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God says we're the children of the morning
God says we're the children of the day
God says we're the children of the morning
God says don't you turn your heart away.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Eagle saints, arise and soar the heavenlies
You know this earthly realm is not your destiny
I've called you to go out and set creation free
My love for you will last throughout eternity.
